title: Spicer on New Immigration Plan: Getting Rid of People Who Pose Threat is No. 1 Priority
text: The Trump Administration saying Tuesday that they will be hiring additional immigration agents in another step towards implementing the President's immigration promises. FOX's Jon Decker reports from the White House: The new DHS guidelines give federal immigration agents wide latitude to
